EmailTemplate.name: ACT Customer Expedite Request
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : Your request to Expedite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. My name is {!Case.OwnerFirstName} and I am handling your request for an expedite related to the referenced item(s).
<Insert item(s) here>
I am contacting the planning organization in an effort to support your request. I will contact you back about this request only if Honeywell confirms that we can support your new requirement. In the meantime, your request date remains unchanged and will ship to the original request date confirmed.
We appreciate every opportunity to serve you.
Sincerely,
Order Support Team
